constantValues: Associates resources with their characteristics and specifies the proficiency level of a resource for that characteristic.

definitions.description: Associates resources with their characteristics and specifies the proficiency level of a resource for that characteristic.

members.name: bookableResourceCharacteristicId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the resource characteristic.

members.description: Unique identifier of the resource characteristic.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type the name of the association between the resource and characteristic.

members.description: Type the name of the association between the resource and characteristic.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.name: traversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: characteristic

constantValues: Choose the characteristic to associate with the resource.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the characteristic to associate with the resource.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: ratingValue

constantValues: Select a rating value that represents the evaluation of a characteristic for a particular resource.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Select a rating value that represents the evaluation of a characteristic for a particular resource.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: resource

constantValues: Shows the resource associated with the characteristic.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the resource associated with the characteristic.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Status of the Bookable Resource Characteristic
